summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 13813, entitled: "An ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or re-assessment to pay the cost and expense of and for the improvement of Harvard Avenue and Harvard Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues named in Ordinance No. 10710, by assessing or re-assessing certain lots, tracts, parcels of land now included in Local Improvement District No. 902, assessment of which was heretofore made under Ordinance No. 11343, and enforcement of which has been declared invalid by the Supreme Court of the State of Washington; all to be done in accordance with the laws of the State of Washington and charter of the City of Seattle" approved June 4, 1906.
